title: FPS low after PC reset
body:
Hey guys,

I recently reset my PC to get rid of all the crap i had on it to improve the performance of my PC but it's a lot worse than before. I installed the drivers for my graphics card and all the things that came with downloading league, but when I stream my fps is 30-60, while it's supposed to be around 55-90.

I'm on the exact same settings in League as I was before I reset my PC. Same stream settings aswell. I feel like I'm missing some kind of program or driver that I didn't think of....

Thank you for your time

replies.body: Since you reset your PC, there could still be outdated drivers or products.  Make sure to update Windows, and if you already did then make sure to also disable the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  It's auto-enabled and has been known to cause fps and even freezing issues for some players.  Make sure to also go over each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune things up.  I hope that helps!

I re-installed my drivers and re-installed league but it didn't help at all. I do however have a Game r3d log that's showing an insane amount of errors....I'm thinking that might be the culprit.

Here is the dropbox link (I think it works):
https://www.dropbox.com/s/j6jv09pkbypqmd4/2017-04-16T16-06-55_r3dlog.txt?dl=0

Thanks for the help :)

Thanks for the follow-up!  Grab those logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  It will give our tech team some more context to help individually with this one.  Hang tight, and we'll see you there!
